participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Resilient and empathetic, often finding strength in adversity.
participant_1.background: i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young. my father is in the army.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Open-minded and adventurous, always seeking new experiences in life.
participant_2.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i have three dogs. i like to watch the olympics.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
